participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, enjoys spending time with family and has a passion for music.
participant_1.background: My music collection is the most valuable thing to me because it represents my personality and interests. I am the youngest of 4 children. I love spending time with my family and bingeing on Netflix. My morning routine begins with checking on my animals and tending to the crops. I spent most of my summer last year playing hockey.

participant_2.name: Oscar
participant_2.personality: Cautious and reserved, tends to be honest and values trust in relationships.
participant_2.background: I once went on a road trip with Oscar and we saw a lot of cool places. I am a very bad liar. I have not gone home in over two years. I do not trust anyone. I am not very coordinated, and I often trip over my own feet.

content.text: Hello, nice to meet you! What's your name?
Hello there! My name is Oscar.
It's nice to meet you Oscar. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go on road trips and explore new places. I've been on quite a few road trips with my friends and family.
Wow, that sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to go on a road trip but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely go on one! It's a great way to see new places and meet new people.
Yeah, I'll have to plan one soon. I've been wanting to go to Colorado.
Colorado is a beautiful state! I've been there once and I loved it.
Yeah, I've heard it's really nice. I want to go skiing there.
I've never been skiing before but I've heard it's really fun.
It is! You should definitely try it out.
If you do, I'll go with you!
